scripts.rel:major: pnpm prerel && pnpm version major --workspaces --no-workspaces-update --include-workspace-root --no-git-tag-version && pnpm seqrel
scripts.rel:minor: pnpm prerel && pnpm version minor --workspaces --no-workspaces-update --include-workspace-root --no-git-tag-version && pnpm seqrel
scripts.rel:patch: pnpm prerel && pnpm version patch --workspaces --no-workspaces-update --include-workspace-root --no-git-tag-version && pnpm seqrel
scripts.seqrel: docusaurus docs:version $npm_package_version && git add . && git commit -m $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
